subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Oregon State capitalized on four turnovers to upset the Trojans on Saturday, snapping U.S.C.’s 27-game Pac-10 winning streak and breaking the national championship race wide open.
snippet: Oregon State capitalized on four turnovers to upset the Trojans on Saturday, snapping U.S.C.’s 27-game Pac-10 winning streak and breaking the national championship race wide open.
